Title: The Priest and the Girl
Writer: Carlos Drummond de Andrade (poem), Carlos Drummond de Andrade (story), Joaquim Pedro de Andrade
Actors: Helena Ignez, Paulo José, Mário Lago, Fauzi Arap
Plot: In a small town in Minas Gerais, the arrival of a young priest causes a commotion in the conservative atmosphere of the place, aggravated by the sudden attraction this priest feels for a ...
